{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12068v1", "title": "Time Advance in PT-Symmetric Quantum Mechanics and Negative Time Delay", "summary": "In a recent experiment Angulo et. al. have reported a negative time delay in
atomic scattering experiments. Here we point out that this could potentially be
the time advance expected in PT-symmetric theories as the PT counterpart to
time delay.", "main_category": "quant-ph", "categories": "quant-ph,hep-th", "published": "2025-04-16T13:24:07Z"}
